  • Method Details

    • tick

      long tick()
      Returns:
      The current number of times that the system timer fires the trigger.

    • firedAt

      @Nullable @Nullable Instant firedAt()
      Returns:
      The time that the system timer fires the trigger.

      The current trigger condition
      See Also:
      • TriggerCondition

    • info

      @Nullable default @Nullable Object info()
      The trigger context info

      • In case of the timing-based trigger, this value is null
      • In case of the event-based trigger, this value is an event message
